generic_name: ALFALFA, CHINA OFF, AVENA SATIVA, HYDRASTIS CAN, CALC PHOS, KALI PHOS, NAT PHOS, MAG PHOS, FERR PHOS, FERRIC CITRATE, ACIDUM PHOS
warnings: Warnings: Do not: use if you have an allergy or hypersensitivity to components of the formula use if pregnant or nursing Stop use and ask a doctor if: condition worsens If symptoms persists for more than 7 days
dosage_administration: Dosage and Administration: Adults: 1 tablespoonful 3 times a day before meal. Children: 1 teaspoonful before meal. Or to be used as directed by registered Homeopathic physician
indications: Indications and Usage : Convalescence, General weakness, Nervous debility, loss of appetite, anemia, and chlorosis.
